name: Parent in Public Folder Suspicious Process
description: This rule detects suspicious processes with parent images located in the C:\Users\Public folder
query: (process.parent.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \/[Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \/[Kk]\ .*/ OR /.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\ \/[Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\ \/[Kk]\ .*/ OR /.*[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:C\:\\Users\\Public\\* AND process.command_line:(*powershell* OR *cmd.exe\ \/c\ * OR *cmd.exe\ \/k\ * OR *cmd\ \/c\ * OR *cmd\ \/k\ * OR *wscript.exe* OR *cscript.exe* OR *bitsadmin* OR *certutil* OR *mshta.exe*))`
